content:
<md># Question about "test\_ps2\_student.py"
##### Tests not running properly
I am having some trouble with "test\_ps2\_student.py" as it does not run any test functions, and there is a "student" term that is undefined (It gives a warning error "Undefined name 'student' "). What should I do?</md>
subject: PS2 Tests Error / Undefined term

content: Does it give that warning when you run the test file? If so, can you post a screenshot of the terminal when you run the test file?

<md>When I test the file, everything runs fine. Also, I managed to figure out where the test functions were being outputted (I had to scroll up a bit on the console). Everything seems to be working fine for now but I will let you know if there are any additional issues. Thanks!</md>
